questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON and the LEDâ€™s illuminate.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/BIONET/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord adapter and confirm whether DC voltage is available10
replace the power adaptor with a new one
check the continuity of power ON/OFF switch and confirm whether the switch is defective.
replace the switch with a new one
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the Doppler probe error appears on the display.
connect the probe again and confirm whether the problem still persist.
cross check the probe with another and confirm whether the probe is defective.
replace the probe with a new one
check and confirm whether there is any damage of probe pin connector.
replace the probe pin connector
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON, but the display is blank / plain.
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable between display and control board
reseat / replace the cable with a new one
repair / replace the display accordingly
check and confirm whether the paper is rolling during print.
check and confirm whether the paper is placed properly.
place the paper properly
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any dust / obstruction in the gears.
clean the dust / obstruction in the gears
check for any damage or breakage of gears.
replace the gears with a new one.
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
